ayas.arabic: يسٓ
ayas.translation: YA SIN.
ayas.transliteration: yā sīn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
ayas.translation: I call to witness the Qur'an, custodian of all laws, --
ayas.transliteration: wal qur-ānil ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayas.translation: That you are indeed one of those sent
ayas.transliteration: innaka laminal mursalīn

ayas.arabic: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: On a path that is straight, --
ayas.transliteration: `alā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayas.translation: A revelation from the mighty, ever-merciful (God),
ayas.transliteration: tanzīlal-`azīzir raḥīm

ayas.arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ
ayas.translation: That you may warn a people whose ancestors had never been warned, who are therefore heedless.
ayas.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābā-uhum fahum ghāfilūn

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: The sentence is surely justified against most of them, for they do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: laqad ḥaqqal qawlu `alā aktharihim fahum lā yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
ayas.translation: We will certainly put iron collars on their heel's which will come up to their chins, so that they will not be able to raise their heads.
ayas.transliteration: innā ja`alnā fī a`nāqihim aghlālan fahiya ilal-adhqāni fahum muqmaḥūn

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And We shall raise a barrier in front of them and a barrier behind them, and cover them over so that they will not be able to see.
ayas.transliteration: waja`alnā min bayni aydīhim saddan wa min khalfihim saddan fa-aghshaynāhum fahum lā yubṣirūn

ayas.arabic: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Whether you warn them or do not warn, it is all the same; they will not believe.
ayas.transliteration: wasawā-un `alayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhirhum lā yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
ayas.translation: You can only warn him who listens to the warning and fears Ar-Rahman secretly. So give him good news of forgiveness and a generous reward.
ayas.transliteration: innamā tundhiru manit-taba`adh dhikra wakhashiyar raḥmāna bil ghayb ۖ fabashhirhu bimaghfiratin wa-ajrin karīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: It is We indeed who bring back the dead to life, and write down what they send ahead (of their deeds), and traces that they leave behind. We keep an account of all things in a lucid register.
ayas.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥyil mawtā wanaktubu mā qaddamū wa-āthārahum ۚ wakulla shay-in aḥṣaynāhu fī imāmin mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Narrate to them the example of the people of the city when the messengers came to it.
ayas.transliteration: waḍrib lahum mathalan aṣ-ḥābal qaryati idh jā-ahal mursalūn

ayas.arabic: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
ayas.translation: When We sent two of them they called them liars; so We sent a third to strengthen them. "We have been sent to you," they said.
ayas.transliteration: idh arsalnā ilayhimuth-nayni fakadhhabūhumā fa`azzaznā bithālithin faqālū innā ilaykum mursalūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
ayas.translation: "You are only men like us," they replied; "Ar-Rahman has not sent down any thing. You are speaking only lies."
ayas.transliteration: qālū mā antum illā basharun mithlunā wa mā anzalar raḥmānu min shay-in in antum illā takdhibūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
ayas.translation: (The messengers) said: "Our Lord knows that we have been sent to you.
ayas.transliteration: qālū rabbunā ya`lamu innā ilaykum lamursalūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayas.translation: Our duty is to convey the message clearly."
ayas.transliteration: wa mā `alaynā illal-balāghul mubīn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: They rejoined: "We feel you augur ill. If you do not desist, we shall stone you to death, and inflict a grievous punishment on you."
ayas.transliteration: qālū innā taṭayyarnā bikum ۖ la-in lam tantahū lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minnā `adhābun alīm

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
ayas.translation: (The messengers) said: "The augury is within your own selves. Do you (consider it a bad omen) that you should be warned? You are a people guilty of excess."
ayas.transliteration: qālū ṭā-irukum ma`akum ۚ a-in dhukkirtum ۚ bal antum qawmun musrifūn

ayas.arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayas.translation: Then a man came running from the other side of the city. "O my people," he said, "follow the messengers.
ayas.transliteration: wajā-a min aqṣal madīnati rajulun yas`ā qāla yāqawmit-tabi`ul mursalīn

ayas.arabic: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
ayas.translation: Follow those who do not ask for any recompense of you, and are rightly guided.
ayas.transliteration: ittabi`ū man lā yas-alukum ajran wahum muhtadūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: Why should I not worship Him who brought me into being, to whom you will be brought back in the end?
ayas.transliteration: wa mā liya lā a`budul ladhī faṭaranī wa ilayhi turja`ūn

ayas.arabic: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
ayas.translation: Should I take other gods apart from Him, who would neither be able to intercede for me nor save me if Ar-Rahman brings me harm?
ayas.transliteration: a-attakhidhu min dūnihi ālihatan in yuridnir raḥmānu biḍurrin lā tughni `annī shafā`atuhum shay-an walā yunqidhūn

ayas.arabic: إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: In that case I would surely be in clear error.
ayas.transliteration: innī idhal lafī ḍalālin mubīn

ayas.arabic: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ
ayas.translation: I believe in your Lord, so listen to me."
ayas.transliteration: innī āmantu birabbikum fasma`ūn

ayas.arabic: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: (But they stoned him to death.) It was said to him: "Enter Paradise;" and he said: "If only my people knew
ayas.transliteration: qīlad-khulil jannah ۖ qāla yālayta qawmī ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
ayas.translation: How my Lord has forgiven me and made me one of those who are honoured!"
ayas.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī waja`alanī minal mukramīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
ayas.translation: We did not send down any army against his people from heaven, nor did We have to send one.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā anzalnā `alā qawmihi min ba`dihi min jundin minas samā-i wa mā kunnā munzilīn

ayas.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَـٰمِدُونَ
ayas.translation: There was just one blast, and they were extinguished.
ayas.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum khāmidūn

ayas.arabic: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayas.translation: Alas for men! No apostle ever came to them but they made fun of him.
ayas.transliteration: yāḥasratan `alal-`ibād ۚ mā ya-tīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
ayas.translation: Have they not seen how many generations have We destroyed before them who will not return again?
ayas.transliteration: alam yaraw kam ahlaknā qablahum minal qurūni annahum ilayhim lā yarji`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
ayas.translation: They will all be brought together before Us.
ayas.transliteration: wa in kullul lammā jamī`ul ladaynā muḥḍarūn

ayas.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَـٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
ayas.translation: There is a sign in the dead earth for them which We quicken, and produce from it grain which they eat.
ayas.transliteration: wa-āyatun lahumul-arḍul maytatu aḥyaynāhā wa-akhrajnā minhā ḥabban faminhu ya-kulūn

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ
ayas.translation: We have laid out gardens of dates and grapes upon it, and made springs of water flow,
ayas.transliteration: waja`alnā fīhā jannātin min nakhīlin wa-a`nābin wafajjarnā fīhā minal `uyūn

ayas.arabic: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
ayas.translation: So that they may eat of its fruit; yet it was not done by their hands. Then why do they not acknowledge thanks?
ayas.transliteration: liya-kulū min thamarihi wa mā `amilat-hu aydīhim ۖ afalā yashkurūn

ayas.arabic: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: All glory to Him who created pairs of everything that grows from the earth, and out of themselves, and other things they do not know.
ayas.transliteration: subḥānal ladhī khalaqal-azwāja kullahā mimmā tunbitul-arḍu wa min anfusihim wa mimmā lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: And there is a sign in the night for them. We strip off the day from it and they are left in darkness,
ayas.transliteration: wa-āyatun lahumul laylu naslakhu minhun nahāra fa-idhā hum muẓlimūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
ayas.translation: While the sun keeps revolving in its orbit. This is the dispensation of the mighty, all-knowing (God).
ayas.transliteration: wash shamsu tajrī limustaqarrin lahā ۚ dhālika taqdīrul `azīzil `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَـٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ
ayas.translation: We have determined the stations of the moon, so that (after its wanderings) it returns as a dried up inflorescent spike of dates.
ayas.transliteration: wal qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā `āda kal `urjūnil qadīm

ayas.arabic: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
ayas.translation: Neither can the sun overtake the moon, nor the night outpace the day: Each of them keeps coursing in its orbit.
ayas.transliteration: lash shamsu yanbaghī lahā an tudrikal qamara walal laylu sābiqun nahār ۚ wakullun fī falakiy yasbaḥūn

ayas.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
ayas.translation: That We bore their progeny in the laden ark is a sign for them;
ayas.transliteration: wa-āyatun lahum annā ḥamalnā dhurriyyatahum fil fulkil mashḥūn

ayas.arabic: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
ayas.translation: And We made similar vessels for them to ride.
ayas.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mithlihi mā yarkabūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
ayas.translation: We could have drowned them if We pleased, and none would have answered their cry for help, nor would they have been saved,
ayas.transliteration: wa in nasha-nughriqhum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūn

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
ayas.translation: Unless by Our benevolence, to reap advantage for a time.
ayas.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wa matā`an ilā ḥīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
ayas.translation: When it is said to them: "Beware of what is before you and what is past, that you may be treated with kindness;"
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā qīla lahumut-taqū mā bayna aydīkum wa mā khalfakum la`allakum turḥamūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
ayas.translation: None of the signs of their Lord ever comes to them but they turn away from it.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā ta-tīhim min āyatim min āyāti rabbihim illā kānū `anhā mu`riḍīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: When they are told: "Spend of what God has given you," the unbelievers say to those who believe: "Why should we feed those whom God should have fed if He pleased?" You are only in palpable error.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā qīla lahum anfiqū mimmā razaqakumullāhu qālal ladhīna kafarū lilladhīna āmanū anuṭ`imu man law yashā-ullāhu aṭ`amahu in antum illā fī ḍalālin mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: And they say: "When will this promise come to pass, if what you say is true?"
ayas.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhal wa`du in kuntum ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
ayas.translation: They are only waiting for a single blast that will seize them, but they will go on contending.
ayas.transliteration: mā yanẓurūna illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan ta-khudhuhum wahum yakhiṣṣimūn

ayas.arabic: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
ayas.translation: Then they would not be able to make a will, or go back to their people.
ayas.transliteration: falā yastaṭī`ūna tawṣiyatan walā ilā ahlihim yarji`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
ayas.translation: When the trumpet blast is sounded they will come out of their graves and hasten to their Lord,
ayas.transliteration: wanufikha fiṣ ṣūri fa-idhā hum minal-ajdāthi ilā rabbihim yansilūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Saying: "Ah woe, who has roused us from our sleep?" This is what Ar-Rahman had promised, and whose truth the apostles had affirmed.
ayas.transliteration: qālū yāwaylanā man ba`athanā min marqadinā ۜ ۗ hādhā mā wa`adar raḥmānu waṣadaqal mursalūn

ayas.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
ayas.translation: It would be but a single blast of the trumpet, and they would all be arraigned before Us.
ayas.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum jamī`ul ladaynā muḥḍarūn

ayas.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: No soul will be wronged the least that Day, nor would be recompensed but only for what it had done.
ayas.transliteration: fal yawma lā tuẓlamu nafsun shay-an walā tujzawna illā mā kuntum ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ
ayas.translation: Surely the inmates of Paradise will be engaged in pastimes.
ayas.transliteration: inna aṣ-ḥābal jannatil yawma fī shughulin fākihūn

ayas.arabic: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
ayas.translation: They and their companions will recline on couches in the shade.
ayas.transliteration: hum wa-azwājuhum fī ẓilālin `alal-arā-iki muttaki-ūn

ayas.arabic: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
ayas.translation: For them will be fruits and whatever they ask.
ayas.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yadda`ūn

ayas.arabic: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
ayas.translation: "Peace" shall be the greeting from the merciful Lord.
ayas.transliteration: salāmun qawlan min rabbin raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
ayas.translation: (And the guilty will be told:) "O sinners, separate yourselves this day.
ayas.transliteration: wamtāzul yawma ayyuhal mujrimūn

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: Did I not commit you, O children of Adam, not to worship Satan who is your acknowledged foe,
ayas.transliteration: alam a`had ilaykum yābanī ādama an lā ta`budush shayṭān ۖ innahu lakum `aduwwun mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
ayas.translation: But to serve Me; (that) this is the straight path?
ayas.transliteration: wa-ani'-budūnī ۚ hādhā ṣirāṭun mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: But he beguiled a great many of you. Why did you not then understand?
ayas.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīrā ۖ afalam takūnū ta`qilūn

ayas.arabic: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: This is the Hell that you were promised.
ayas.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamul latī kuntum tū`adūn

ayas.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
ayas.translation: Roast in it now for having disbelieved."
ayas.transliteration: iṣ-lawhal yawma bimā kuntum takfurūn

ayas.arabic: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: We shall seal their lips that day; and their hands will speak, their feet testify to what they had done.
ayas.transliteration: al yawma nakhtimu `alā afwāhihim watukallimunā aydīhim watash-hadu arjuluhum bimā kānū yaksibūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: We could take away their sight if We pleased; then they would run around to find the way: But how then would they see?
ayas.transliteration: walaw nashā-u laṭamasnā `alā a`yunihim fastabaquṣ ṣirāṭa fa-annā yubṣirūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
ayas.translation: And if We pleased We could paralyse them in their tracks, and they would not be able to move forward or turn back.
ayas.transliteration: walaw nashā-u lamasakhnāhum `alā makānatihim famas-taṭā`ū muḍiyyan walā yarji`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: Whoever reaches old age, We reverse in natural disposition. Do they not have sense (to see)?
ayas.transliteration: wa man nu`ammirhu nunakkis-hu fil khalq ۖ afalā ya`qilūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: We have not taught (Muhammad) to versify, nor is it worthy of him. This is nothing but a reminder and illuminating discourse,
ayas.transliteration: wa mā `allamnāhush shi`ra wa mā yanbaghī lah ۚ in huwa illā dhikrun waqur-ānun mubīn

ayas.arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: So that he may warn him who is alive and feels, and justify the word against those who do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: liyundhira man kāna ḥayyan wayaḥiqqal qawlu `alal-kāfirīn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ
ayas.translation: Do they not see the cattle among things We have fashioned by Our power, which they own,
ayas.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā khalaqnā lahum mimmā `amilat aydīnā an`āman fahum lahā mālikūn

ayas.arabic: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
ayas.translation: Whom We made subservient to them so that some of them they ride and some they eat?
ayas.transliteration: wadhallalnāhā lahum faminhā rakūbuhum wa minhā ya-kulūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
ayas.translation: And they derive other advantages and drinks from them. Even then they do not offer thanks,
ayas.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfi`u wa mashārib ۖ afalā yashkurūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
ayas.translation: And take other gods apart from God that they may perhaps give them help.
ayas.transliteration: wattakhadhū min dūnillāhi ālihatan la`allahum yunṣarūn

ayas.arabic: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
ayas.translation: They will not be able to help them and will be brought (to Us) as their levied troops.
ayas.transliteration: lā yastaṭī`ūna naṣrahum wahum lahum jundun muḥḍarūn

ayas.arabic: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
ayas.translation: So be not grieved by what they say. We certainly know what they hide and disclose.
ayas.transliteration: falā yaḥzunka qawluhum ۘ innā na`lamu mā yusirrūna wa mā yu`linūn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: Does not man see We created him from a drop of semen? Even then he becomes an open contender,
ayas.transliteration: awalam yaral-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min nuṭfatin fa-idhā huwa khaṣīmun mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And applies comparisons to Us, having forgotten his origin, and says: "Who can put life into decayed bones?"
ayas.transliteration: waḍaraba lanā mathalan wanasiya khalqah ۖ qāla man yuḥyil `iẓāma wahiya ramīm

ayas.arabic: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Say: "He who created you the first time. He has knowledge of every creation,
ayas.transliteration: qul yuḥyīhal ladhī ansha-ahā awwala marrah ۖ wahuwa bikulli khalqin `alīm

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
ayas.translation: Who gave you fire from a green tree, with which you ignite the flame."
ayas.transliteration: alladhī ja`ala lakum minash shajaril-akhḍari nāran fa-idhā antum minhu tūqidūn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayas.translation: How can He who created the heavens and the earth not be able to create others like them? Why not? He is the real creator all-knowing.
ayas.transliteration: awalaysal ladhī khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa biqādirin `alā an yakhluqa mithlahum ۚ balā wahuwal khallāqul `alīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
ayas.translation: When He wills a thing He has only to say: "Be," and it is.
ayas.transliteration: innamā amruhu idhā arāda shay-an an yaqūla lahu kun fayakūn

ayas.arabic: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: So all glory to Him who holds all power over everything, to whom you will go back in the end.
ayas.transliteration: fasubḥānal ladhī biyadihi malakūtu kulli shay-in wa ilayhi turja`ūn
